offeringId.description: Offering which Alice would like to get a quote for

payinAmount.description: Amount of quote currency you want to spend in order to receive base currency

claims.description: Presentation Submission that fulfills the requirements included in the respective Offering

kind.description: Type of payment method e.g. BTC_ADDRESS, DEBIT_CARD, MOMO_MPESA

paymentDetails.description: An object containing the properties defined in the respective Offering's requiredPaymentDetails json schema

replyTo.description: A string containing a valid URI where new messages from the PFI will be sent
